entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
